gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 125, Raptors 104
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hawks defeated the Raptors, 125-104. Trae Young recorded 38 points (29 in the 2nd half) and 11 assists for the Hawks, with Bogdan Bogdanovic adding 20 points, six assists, and three rebounds in the victory. Scottie Barnes tallied 23 points, eight assists, and four rebounds for the Raptors in the losing effort. The Hawks improve to 10-14 in the regular season, while the Raptors fall to 10-15.
